hanzi-su-wiki:
黙

Значения

Молчать; молчание

Мнемоника

Искажено. Тихая ночь. На мили 里 вокруг не видно и уголька 灬, да и собак 犬 не слышно.

Варианты

默

默默RS
黙黙		silent, quiet, still, dark
  • RS. black 黑/黒 dog 犬: silent
heisig_constituent: silence, black, computer, chihuahua, dog, large, drop, oven-fire, barbecue
heisig_story: Oddly enough, the character for silence shows us a black chihuahua. Actually, the cute little critter's name is Darkness, as I am sure you remember from the famous song about silence that begins, "Hello, Darkness, my old friend...." Note how the four dots reach all the way across the bottom of the character.
myStory: у родительского дома накала собака и ее сожгли
Keyword_KANJIDIC: silence, become silent, stop speaking, leave as is
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: тишина, замолкает, остановка говоря, оставить как есть
koohiiStory1: The computer won´t stop beeping, which is making the chihauhua bark, and it´s driving this guy insane. The only solution he can come up with is to throw them both on the fire and finally enjoy the silence.
koohiiStory2: Your neighbor is so sick of you playing Led Zeppelin that he takes your copy of the song Black Dog and burns it. Finally, silence in the neighborhood.
jp_example_words:
沈黙(ちんもく): silence, reticence
黙る(だまる): be silent
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Your village wants to take the village dog and boil it, and you can think of no other response than SHUT UP!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: The entire village is shouting and yelling and pointing at the poor dog. They're boiling a giant boiling pot of water, and you can't even hear yourself think anymore. Shut up, shut up, shut up!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The villagers are mad that you told them to shut up, and they start to mock (もく) you. They put their hands on their hips, lean forward, cross their eyes, and yell "SHUT UP!" back.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Even the dog is mocking you now. It's barks sound more like "shut up, shut up" than "bow wow, bow wow." What the heck dog, I was trying to save your life!
Ru_Meaning: silence, become silent, stop speaking, leave as is
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 然 (しか、ゼン так, таким образом).
Ru_Radicals: 杰, 犬 (собака), 里 (родная деревня), 黒 (чёрный)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the village (里) dog (犬) on the fire (灬) remains silent

沈黙(ちんもく): silence, reticence
黙る(だまる): be silent

黙字的基本解释

黙
mò
古同“默”。

黙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mò］
［《廣韻》莫北切，入德，明。］
亦作“黙1”。
(1)静默；不语。
(2)暗暗；私下。
(3)隐居；困窘。
(4)黑暗。
(5)默写。
(6)方言。思考。
(7)通“墨”。贪污。
(8)通“驀”。忽然，突然。
(9)姓。明有默思道。见《万姓统谱·入职》。

黙字的康熙字典解释
黙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
黙字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Drunk
mò
Gu Tong "silently".
Drunk
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mò］
["Guangyun" Mo Beiqie, enter the German, Ming. ]
Also known as "黙1".
(1) Silence; silent.
(2) Secretly; privately.
(3) Seclusion; embarrassment.
(4) Darkness.
(5) Silent writing.
(6) Dialects. Thinking.
(7) Through "ink". corruption.
(8) Through "蓦". Suddenly, suddenly.
(9) Last name. Obviously meditation. See "Ten Thousand Surnames · Entry".

Name meaning
Nothing.
mò
яп. вм. 默
Radicals: 里, 犬, 灬  (village, dog, boil)
Meaning Mnemonic
Your village wants to take the village dog and boil it, and you can think of no other response than SHUT UP!
The entire village is shouting and yelling and pointing at the poor dog. They're boiling a giant boiling pot of water, and you can't even hear yourself think anymore. Shut up, shut up, shut up!
Reading Mnemonic
The villagers are mad that you told them to shut up, and they start to mock (もく) you. They put their hands on their hips, lean forward, cross their eyes, and yell "SHUT UP!" back.
Even the dog is mocking you now. It's barks sound more like "shut up, shut up" than "bow wow, bow wow." What the heck dog, I was trying to save your life!
